theme_caption.[4, 30, 66, 105]: Evening Strolls and Sightseeing: These clips capture people enjoying leisurely walks and sightseeing along waterfronts during the evening, highlighting the serene and exploratory atmosphere.
theme_caption.[16, 36, 85, 88, 96]: Boat Rides and Cityscapes: This theme focuses on tourists and groups enjoying boat rides, offering views of city skylines and waterfronts, emphasizing the theme of exploration and leisure.
theme_caption.[18, 24, 25, 40, 77]: Ferry Arrivals and Departures: These clips depict ferries and boats arriving and departing from docks, showcasing moments of transition and movement along the waterfronts.
theme_caption.[49, 98, 103, 106]: Daytime Activities and Scenic Views: These clips highlight daytime activities such as walking, sightseeing, and enjoying panoramic views of the city, capturing the vibrancy of urban life.

story_result.global_caption: The video collection offers a captivating journey through the vibrant urban waterfronts of Marina Bay and other cityscapes, capturing both daytime and evening activities. It begins with serene strolls along the waterfronts, setting a relaxed and exploratory tone. The narrative then transitions into the dynamic movement of ferries and boats, depicting moments of arrival and departure that add a sense of anticipation and exploration. As the story unfolds, viewers are treated to scenic boat rides offering panoramic views of the city skyline, emphasizing the beauty and allure of urban life. The sequence concludes with a return to the bustling energy of the city, capturing the communal experience of people enjoying the waterfronts, whether through leisurely walks or sightseeing, both day and night.
